plot: Ten years ago Fujiwara noticed he had a power to see multicolored auras surrounding the person's body. Ever since then he's been having a weird dream about a war with cats. Then one day a mysterious girl falls on top of him...
ending_theme: "Yume to Kibō to Ashita no Atashi" (ユメとキボーとアシタのアタシ) by Ayane Sakura
